transArray.content: The room is clean, tidy and comfortable, I really like it

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel at home. I believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel to ensure that you will be happy every time you stay. All the staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your next stay, thank you! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
